title: 135: Pastoral Theology and the Classical Tradition
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Magbee, a counselor in his own right, discusses Andrew Purves's book. How should one view counseling and brain chemistry, pastoring and sin? It's a toughy, and that's coming from somebody with SAD. Seriously. I have a thing called "S.A.D." that makes me sad.
itunes:author: 3 dudes you should definitely NOT get counseled by . . . cep maybe Magbee
itunes:subtitle: Finding wiseguys is more than just the practice of the FBI
